author: Jack Gramenz
title: Coronavirus Australia: Vodafone, Optus announce no fees for healthcare workers
description: Coronavirus Australia: Vodafone, Optus announce no fees for healthcare workers news.com.au
content: Two of the countrys biggest telcos have stepped up their assistance for the heroes on the frontline of the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.Vodafone and Optus are waiving mobile access charges for customers who are registered health professionals for tw… [+3660 chars]
